name: 郭政淳
objective: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
schedule:
Week 1  Course Introduction
Week 2  Verb Tenses (I)
Week 3  Verb Tenses (II) 
Week 4  Subject-Verb Agreement
Week 5  Nouns
Week 6  Articles
Week 7  Pronouns
Week 8  Modal (I)
Week 9  Modal (II)
Week 10  Midterm Exam
Week 11 The Passive
Week 12 Adjective Clauses
Week 13 Gerunds and Infinitives (I)
Week 14 Gerunds and Infinitives (II)
Week 15 Coordinating Conjunctions
Week 16 Adverb Clauses
Week 17 Reduction of Adverb Clauses to Modifying Adverbial Phrases
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
In-class Activity: 20%
Student-led tutorials: 10% 
Quizzes 30%
Midterm exam 20%
Final exam 20%
materials:
Azar, B. S. & Hagen, S. A. 2017. Understanding and Using English Grammar (5th ed.). New York: Pearson Education.
